notes:
Data collected from September 16 to 23 by StandBy Task Force volunteers for Internews. The data gathered covers organizations that have an online presence and that indicate they are specifically providing services for refugees traveling the Balkans route. 
More information here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1a-bSHmO_aJ-W4lYMhSGmiNxk8C3Zek6dU1OhOAAtoKg/edit
